dcterms:creator: Caroline Claus
Craig Boutilier
dcterms:description: A cooperative multi-agent reinforcement learning environment where agents must learn to coordinate their actions to achieve optimal outcomes, often studied for its dynamics in learning pathologies.
dcterms:title: Climb Game

dcterms:description: A new environment introduced in this paper, based on the Climb Game, where agents must coordinate to extinguish fires in a gridworld setting.
dcterms:title: Apprentice Firemen Game (AFG)

dcterms:creator: Caroline Claus
Craig Boutilier
dcterms:description: Variations of the Climb Game used to study the susceptibility of independent learners towards relative overgeneralisation and stochastic rewards.
dcterms:title: Variations of the Climb Game

dcterms:description: A reward structure where rewards are deterministic, providing consistent outcomes for actions taken by agents.
dcterms:title: Deterministic (DET) Reward Structure

dcterms:description: A reward structure where some rewards are stochastic, introducing variability in the outcomes of actions taken by agents.
dcterms:title: Partially Stochastic (PS) Reward Structure

dcterms:description: A reward structure where all rewards are stochastic, leading to highly variable outcomes for actions taken by agents.
dcterms:title: Fully Stochastic (FS) Reward Structure
